column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Tried bone marrow for the first time here. I'm sure it's a good version
column3: I don't get it. It's just fat! I knew that before I ordered it
column4: and don't know what I was expecting
column6: you just scoop fat onto bread with jam. It tasted ok
column7: but so would anything that well-marbled.
